Screener.text: Which of the following best describes your employment status?

options.text: Employed full-time (30 hours per week or more)
Employed part-time (less than 30 hours per week)
Contract or seasonal worker for one or multiple employers

conditions.qualification_logic: To qualify for survey, r1, r2, or r3 (working full, part, or self-employed) must be selected.

Screener.text: Including yourself, approximately how many full-time equivalent staff does your business employ across all locations in the US?

options.text: I am the sole owner / operator of my business

conditions.qualification_logic: To qualify for survey, COSIZE=r6-11 (100+ employees) OR REVENUE=r5-r12 ($100m+ revenue).

Screener.text: What was the total revenue of your business in 2024 across all locations in the US?

conditions.qualification_logic: To qualify for survey, COSIZE=r6-11 (100+ employees) OR REVENUE=r5-r12 ($100m+ revenue).

instructions: Please select one. Your best estimate is fine.

Screener.text: Which of the below financial responsibilities, if any, fall within the scope of your job?

conditions.qualification_logic: To qualify for survey, FUNCTION=r2, r3, r4, r5, or r14 (AR, Cash App, Controls, Credit & Collect., or Treasury) must be selected.

Screener.text: Which of the following best describes your current role in your business?

options.text: Owner, Partner, CEO, Founder, President, or similar

conditions.qualification_logic: Flag r1-6 (Controller or VP or higher) as priority roles.

Screener.text: To what extent are you involved in the decision-making process about the products and services your business uses for the following?

options.text: I have no say in the decision
My opinion contributes to decision making
I am one of the final decision makers

conditions.qualification_logic: To qualify for survey, either r2 or r3 must be c2 or c3 - decision making authority for AR or Cash Application.

comments: Rows: Accounts Payable, Accounts Receivable, Cash Application, Spend & Expense.

Screener.text: How familiar are you with the following financial systems suppliers?

options.text: Know the brand well; not currently using

conditions.qualification_logic: Terminate if either are true: HSAMPLE=r1 and FAMILIARITY r1=c1 (Never Heard of BILL) OR HSAMPLE=r1 and FAMILIARITY r2-r5 = c5 (employee of competitor).

comments: Rows: BILL, High Radius, Billtrust, BlackLine, Ramp.

Functional Profiling & Needs.text: To what extent is your business’s cash application automated? Please choose the response that best describes your business’ approach.

options.text: Largely manual: Primarily through spreadsheets, manual inputs, from different data sources
Partially automated: Some manual data handling with significant portions automated
Fully integrated: Entirely within a software solution with automatic updates and data integration

Functional Profiling & Needs.text: Which software/tools does your company currently use for cash application?
What third party payment aggregators or providers do your customers use to pay you?

options.text: None of these – we do not receive funds from third party payment providers.

Functional Profiling & Needs.text: Are there any issues or concerns that you struggle with when it comes to cash application and collections systems or workflow?
comments: Option: Not sure/none come to mind.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: What is your overall impression of this new reconciliation solution from BILL?
Now thinking only about the features this reconciliation solution would offer, which of these features is most valuable for your business?

options.text: Automated Delivery: Set preferences for automated payments and daily consolidated remittance to support your AR automation.
Bank Account Management: Set and manage multiple bank accounts for each of your entities, ensuring precise payment routing and accurate reconciliation across your entire organization.
Check Conversion: Convert checks to card or ACH to get paid faster and reduce DSO.
Custom reports: Create reports that can work with your cash application software or data pulled directly into your ERP.
Dedicated Support: White glove onboarding and support with a dedicated BILL strategic account manager, ensuring ongoing personalized care.

Enterprise Portal: A single place to see all payments, statuses, customers and paid invoices. Maintain control over your financial security by managing access, defining user roles, and restricting certain actions —like bank account changes. Includes configurable reporting capabilities and file delivery options.
Remittance File: Receive a file containing payments and remittance details from customers sent daily via email or SFTP.
Tailored Remittance: Customize remittance data fields to your systems.
Works with your automation & ERP: Seamlessly integrates into your existing systems to streamline payment and remittance workflows.

instructions: Please select your top two features.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Based on everything you have just read about the new reconciliation solution from BILL, how likely is it that your business would purchase this solution if the price were right?

conditions.qualification_logic: Show WTP_YES if WTP=r4-5 (likely or extremely likely). Show WTP_NO if WTP=r1-2 (unlikely or extremely unlikely).

Concept Test & Value Story.text: You mentioned that you would be likely to purchase this solution. In a few words, please tell us the main reason you would be likely to purchase the new reconciliation solution from BILL.

conditions.qualification_logic: Show if WTP=r4-5 (likely or extremely likely).

Concept Test & Value Story.text: You mentioned that you would not be likely to purchase this solution. In a few words, please tell us the main reason you would not be likely to purchase the new reconciliation solution from BILL.

conditions.qualification_logic: Show if WTP=r1-2 (unlikely or extremely unlikely).

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Which of the benefits of the solution below, if any, are relevant to your business?

options.text: Reduce manual processes and streamline payment processing through automated delivery of payments and daily consolidated remittance files.
Receive a daily, consolidated remittance file containing all payment and remittance details from every customer, delivered via email or SFTP that works with your existing or future automation tools.
Save on the costs associated with manual remittance and improve analyst efficiency, empowering them to focus on initiatives that fuel business growth.
Minimize human error with a single consolidated file that matches payments and remittance advice, delivered automatically.
Get paid faster and reduce DSO by converting checks to ACH.
BILL gives you the flexibility to route payments, control when you get paid, and tailor remittance data to your systems.
Set and manage multiple bank accounts for each of your entities, ensuring precise payment routing and accurate reconciliation across your entire organization.
Little to no IT effort: Just confirm your bank accounts, your entities, and review the single remittance file — that’s it.
It’s not a software suite & long implementation. Just confirm your accounts and entities and customize your single remittance file. Go live in a matter of weeks, not months.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Below are some additional benefits. Which of these benefits of the solution, if any, are relevant to your business?

options.text: Reduce manual processes and streamline payment processing through automated delivery of payments and daily consolidated remittance files.
Receive a daily, consolidated remittance file containing all payment and remittance details from every customer, delivered via email or SFTP that works with your existing or future automation tools.
Save on the costs associated with manual remittance and improve analyst efficiency, empowering them to focus on initiatives that fuel business growth.
Minimize human error with a single consolidated file that matches payments and remittance advice, delivered automatically.
Get paid faster and reduce DSO by converting checks to ACH.
BILL gives you the flexibility to route payments, control when you get paid, and tailor remittance data to your systems.
Set and manage multiple bank accounts for each of your entities, ensuring precise payment routing and accurate reconciliation across your entire organization.
Little to no IT effort: Just confirm your bank accounts, your entities, and review the single remittance file — that’s it.
It’s not a software suite & long implementation. Just confirm your accounts and entities and customize your single remittance file. Go live in a matter of weeks, not months.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Below are the benefits you indicated are relevant to your business. Now please rank the benefits in terms of how appealing they are for your business, where 1 is MOST appealing, 2 is SECOND most appealing, and so on.

conditions.qualification_logic: Show if any rows selected at BENEFIT_A or BENEFIT_B.

instructions: Pipe any rows selected at BENEFIT_A or BENEFIT_B.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Next we will show you marketing messages that describe the solution and its benefits. For each message, please indicate if it’s appealing or not appealing for your business.
instructions: Carousel - show one message at a time with two buttons.
comments: Messages: SMB Efficiency, Complementary Tool, Quick & Lightweight, Difficult, Tedious Payments, Coverage Gap Filler.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Below are messages you indicated are appealing for your business. Which of these is most appealing?

conditions.qualification_logic: Show if multiple rows selected 'Yes - appealing' at POSITION.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Below is the description you said was most appealing for your business. Please take a moment to highlight the words or phrases in the text below that felt persuasive or impactful to you.

conditions.qualification_logic: Show if any row selected or autopunched at POS_RANK.

Concept Test & Value Story.text: Below are three names BILL is considering for the reconciliation solution. Please pick the name that you think best describes the solution.

Additional Profiling.text: Which of the following describes the industry your business or organization is in?

options.text: Consumer goods - all other (e.g., apparel, consumer electronics, beauty products)
Corporate services (e.g., accounting, bookkeeping, consulting, staffing)
Entertainment and Media (e.g., animation, film, music, broadcast)
Information technology (Hardware, Software, Services, SaaS) - incl. B2B / B2C Tech
Healthcare - medical devices, incl. electro medical
Healthcare - all other (e.g., pharmaceuticals, provider, payer, veterinary)
Marketing and PR (incl. advertising, public relations, market research, publishing)
Recreation & Travel (e.g., hospitality, tourism, restaurants, sports, gambling)
Telecommunications (incl. mobile and cable TV / data)

conditions.qualification_logic: Flag Priority Industries r5, r11, r13, r19 (Consumer-Food Svcs, Healthcare-Med Devices, Legal Services, Transportation).

Additional Profiling.text: How many individual legal entities constitute your overall business structure?
Please think about all of your business’ customers. In terms of the total count of customers, what is the approximate percentage in each of the following categories?
instructions: Drop down; Must add up to 100%, allow 0%; show (dynamic) total sum to the respondents (on top or bottom of items).
comments: Rows: Consumers/Individuals, Small businesses, Mid-market, Enterprise.

Additional Profiling.text: Approximately what percentage of your business’ invoices each month are paid via paper check, ACH, and other methods? Please think in terms of the total count of invoices.
instructions: Drop down; Must add up to 100%, allow 0%; show (dynamic) total sum to the respondents (on top or bottom of items).
comments: Rows: Paper Checks, Bank transfer (ACH, Wire), Other methods.

Additional Profiling.text: What is your business’ average Days Sales Outstanding (DSO)?
comments: Options: Open numeric, allow 0; Don’t know; Don't track DSO.

Additional Profiling.text: Which of the following is a top priority for you in your role?

Thank you for your valuable feedback. Please provide your email address to receive the $20 e-gift card. Please note your email will be used only to contact you and provide your incentive if you are one of the first 100 fully completed responses.
